title: Practicing Hiragana and Katakana
body:
</practice hiragana:1168962724659724295> • </practice katakana:1168863923022344314> • </practice both:1168863923022344314>

This is a bot that helps you practice Hiragana and Katakana. If you haven't learned kana yet, check out the [hiragana guide](https://www.tofugu.com/japanese/learn-hiragana/) or the [katakana guide](https://www.tofugu.com/japanese/learn-katakana/) by Tofugu.

**Examples:**
- /learn hiragana ``include: a`` ``exclude: all-main-kana が``
- /learn katakana ``exclude: all-main-kana all-dakuten-kana``

hiragana.title: Hiragana Options
hiragana.body: When you use </practice hiragana:1168962724659724295> or </practice both:1168863923022344314> you can filter what your tested on. By default, all kana is included then you can exclude kana and re-add specific kana.

fields.title: Main Kana
fields.body:
- all-main-kana 
- あ/a 
- か/ka 
- さ/sa 
- た/ta 
- な/na 
- は/ha 
- ま/ma 
- や/ya 
- ら/ra 
- わ/wa

fields.title: Dakuten Kana
fields.body:
- all-dakuten-kana 
- が/ga 
- ざ/za 
- だ/da 
- ば/ba 
- ぱ/pa

fields.title: Combination Kana
fields.body:
- all-combination-kana 
- きゃ/kya 
- しゃ/sha 
- ちゃ/cha 
- にゃ/nya 
- ひゃ/hya 
- みゃ/mya 
- りゃ/rya 
- ぎゃ/gya 
- じゃ/ja 
- ぢゃ/dya 
- びゃ/bya 
- ぴゃ/pya

katakana.title: Katakana Options
katakana.body: When you use </practice katakana:1168863923022344314> or </practice both:1168863923022344314> you can filter what your tested on. By default, all kana is included then you can exclude kana and re-add specific kana.

fields.title: Main Kana
fields.body:
- all-main-kana 
- ア/a 
- カ/ka 
- サ/sa 
- タ/ta 
- ナ/na 
- ハ/ha 
- マ/ma 
- ヤ/ya 
- ラ/ra 
- ワ/wa

fields.title: Dakuten Kana
fields.body:
- all-dakuten-kana 
- ガ/ga 
- ザ/za 
- ダ/da 
- バ/ba 
- パ/pa

fields.title: Combination Kana
fields.body:
- all-combination-kana 
- キャ/kya 
- シャ/sha 
- チャ/cha 
- ニャ/nya 
- ヒャ/hya 
- ミャ/mya 
- リャ/rya 
- ギャ/gya 
- ジャ/ja 
- ヂャ/dya 
- ビャ/bya 
- ピャ/pya
